snippet: Andy Palmer, executive vice president of Nissan, attended a roundtable in Lower Manhattan to discuss how the automaker was responding to criticisms of its Leaf.
abstract: Andy Palmer, executive vice president of Nissan, attended a roundtable in Lower Manhattan to discuss how the automaker was responding to criticisms of its Leaf.

headline.main: Facing Owner Complaints on Leaf E.V., Nissan Executive Defends Company's Record
